about_the_game:
Trapped in the dark and mysterious castle of a Fallen Angel, a powerful wizard finds their body and soul torn apart. To escape this cursed place and reclaim their unity, the wizard must face a gauntlet of cunning puzzles set by the very being who divided them. With only a fragile connection between their body and soul, every step demands careful thought and unwavering resolve.

Soul Pact is a mind-bending cooperative puzzle adventure inspired by the We Were Here franchise. You and a partner must take on the roles of the wizard's body and soul, each navigating distinct parts of the castle. Communication is your only tool to bridge the gap between your divided perspectives and solve the Fallen Angel’s devious challenges.

Are you prepared to prove your wits, communication skills, and teamwork in a race against time to reunite the wizard’s essence?

  • Atmospheric thriller experience: Traverse the shadowy halls of a castle steeped in dread and ancient magic.

  • Unique dual perspectives: One player commands the wizard’s body, exploring physical realms, while the other controls the soul, uncovering spiritual dimensions of the castle.

  • Intricate puzzles to solve: Test your minds and your connection as you uncover clues and solve increasingly complex riddles.

  • Immersive storytelling: Uncover the dark history of the Fallen Angel and the tragic events that led to your separation.

  • Inspired by games like We Were Here, Myst, and the thrill of real-life escape rooms.

Gather your courage and choose your partner wisely. Together, you’ll determine if the wizard’s soul and body can forge their Soul Pact once more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: i3-4130 or equivalant
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 or equivalant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: A working PC-compatible microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 equivalant or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: A working PC-compatible microphone

short_description: A cooperative puzzle adventure where players take on the roles of a wizard's body and soul, working together to solve challenging puzzles set by a Fallen Angel in a dark, mysterious castle.
